title: Mayor Vigilante

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Shoot a player at night. Costs one bullet.
- Reveal yourself as the Mayor Vigilante during the day. 1 use.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If you shoot a Townie while unrevealed, you lose all bullets and the ability to reveal, then shoot yourself the next night. This doesn't apply when revealed because you can come up with a good reason from your position of power.
- You start with 3 bullets.
- When you reveal yourself, it will be announced to the Town.
- When revealed, gain 9 bullets.
- When revealed, your vote counts as 3 (bullets to the head). (You shoot your voting target three times.)
- While revealed, you cannot send or receive whispers, and Town roles with abilities that grant defense without counterattacking will not be able to use those abilities on you.
